content: AC-D RL Rail cutting disc Abrasive disc for cutting steel railway tracks using fixed rail saws with clamp ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Helps to speed up railway maintenance and repair – an advanced grain and bond system makes these cut-off wheels faster, stronger and more durable Built for your working comfort – cut rails with low sparks and reduced vibration Applications Cutting railway tracks using rail saws equipped with a clamp ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Rail Tool type: Rail saw (fixed) Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Rail | Tool type | Rail saw (fixed) | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 ### ITEMS- 436737 - Cutting disc 14x1/8x1 RL SP - Package Size 10 pc - 436739 - Cutting disc 16x1/8x1 RL SP - Package Size 10 pc
